I'm a Canadian graphic designer currently living in the Netherlands. Throughout my career I've been fortunate enough to work on a diverse range of design projects. My approach to design is heavily influenced by the Brutalist style, characterized by bold, utilitarian aesthetics that focus on functionality and purpose.
